paragraph_content: The Agate Jar is one of the Curios items you can find throughout Black Myth: Wukong. It is one of the strongest early-game Curios' thanks to its effect.

paragraph_content: With the Agate Jar equipped, you will get a flat-out, moderate defense buff, which is incredibly useful early on in the game.

h2_title: Black Myth: Wukong Agate Jar Location
paragraph_content: The Agate Jar can be found in a box in the arena after fighting the Black Wind King in Black Wind Cave \- Cave Interior in Black Wind Mountain. Simply defeat the Black Wind King and head over to this box in the arena to get the Agate Jar.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Agate_Jar.md', within the main section titled 'Agate Jar', specifically from the subsection 'Black Myth: Wukong Agate Jar Location'.
The content is as follows:
The Agate Jar can be found in a box in the arena after fighting the Black Wind King in Black Wind Cave \- Cave Interior in Black Wind Mountain. Simply defeat the Black Wind King and head over to this box in the arena to get the Agate Jar.

paragraph_content: The Curios items in Black Myth: Wukong can't be upgraded, so you can't enhance their buffs in any way. Therefore, if you find a better item for your build, you will want to switch the items out as soon as you can.
